scripts.build: npm run bump:sw && npm run bump-sw-version
scripts.lh:mobile: mkdir -p ./docs/lighthouse && CHROME_BIN=$(command -v google-chrome-stable || command -v google-chrome || command -v chromium-browser || command -v chromium || true) && CHROME_PATH=${CHROME_PATH:-$CHROME_BIN} lighthouse ${LHCI_URL:-https://sscaff.netlify.app} --form-factor=mobile --screenEmulation.mobile=true --only-categories=performance,accessibility,best-practices,seo --throttling-method=provided --throttling.rttMs=0 --throttling.requestLatencyMs=0 --throttling.downloadThroughputKbps=0 --throttling.uploadThroughputKbps=0 --throttling.cpuSlowdownMultiplier=1 --chrome-flags="--headless=new --no-sandbox --disable-gpu --disable-dev-shm-usage --ignore-certificate-errors" --output=json --output-path=./docs/lighthouse/latest-mobile.json
scripts.test:lh:mobile: mkdir -p ./docs/lighthouse && CHROME_BIN=$(command -v google-chrome-stable || command -v google-chrome || command -v chromium-browser || command -v chromium || true) && CHROME_PATH=${CHROME_PATH:-$CHROME_BIN} lighthouse "${LHCI_URL:-http://127.0.0.1:4173}" --form-factor=mobile --screenEmulation.mobile=true --only-categories=performance,accessibility,best-practices,seo --throttling-method=provided --throttling.rttMs=0 --throttling.requestLatencyMs=0 --throttling.downloadThroughputKbps=0 --throttling.uploadThroughputKbps=0 --throttling.cpuSlowdownMultiplier=1 --max-wait-for-load=90000 --chrome-flags="--headless=new --no-sandbox --disable-gpu --disable-dev-shm-usage --ignore-certificate-errors" --output=json --output-path=./docs/lighthouse/latest-mobile.json
scripts.test:super: npm run build && npm run test:html && npm run test:links && npm run test:lh:mobile && npm run test:lh:enforce
